Wide Mouth Preform Moulds

[vc_column_text]Wide mouth preform mould also named Jar preform mould, The jar preforms or wide mouth preforms are mainly designed for the candy and the nuts packaging.WASHUNhas been designing and manufactuer for those preform mould for many years,WASHUNprovides both of valve gate system and supper small runner nub system for the different wide mouth preform application.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
The Wide Mouth Preform Moulds Produced byWASHUN
